isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Power Cylinders - Inspection - Checking Counterbore Depth

svcprocinfo.para: Use one of the following methods to check the depth of the crankcase counterbore:

note.para: Clean counterbore surface and remove existing shims if any before measuring counterbore depth.

figure.caption: Checking counterbore depth with surface gauge

step1.para: Place the indicator tip of the surface gauge on the crankcase. Zero the dial indicator.
Move the indicator tip onto the counterbore ledge. Record the counterbore depth reading on the dial indicator.
Take counterbore depth measurements at four evenly spaced locations around the counterbore ledge.
Compare the counterbore depth and variation between the four measurements with those listed in specifications.
If the maximum variation between the four measurements exceeds the specification, resurface the counterbore.

note.para: Clean counterbore surface and remove existing shims if any before measuring counterbore depth.

figure.caption: Checking counterbore depth with depth micrometer

step1.para: Place a depth micrometer onto the counterbore ledge. Record the counterbore depth reading.
Take counterbore depth measurements at four evenly spaced locations around the counterbore ledge.
Compare the counterbore depth and variation between the four measurements with specifications.
If the maximum variation between the four measurements exceeds the specification, resurface the counterbore.
